## Keys endpoint
 - [Get single jwk](#get-a-single-jwk)
 - [Get all jwks](#get-all-jwks)

### Get a single jwk
```
GET /api/public/v1/jwk/rsa/<key-id>
Host: sso.tokensmith.net
Content-Type: application/jwt;charset=UTF-8
Accept: application/jwt;charset=UTF-8
```

```
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Cache-Control: no-store
Pragma: no-cache

{
    "key_id": "6a76daff-113f-4c84-83e2-5362b801bf91",
    "use": "SIGNATURE",
    "n": ,
    "e": 65537
}
```


### Get all jwks
```
GET /api/public/v1/jwk/rsa?page=1
Host: sso.tokensmith.net
Content-Type: application/jwt;charset=UTF-8
Accept: application/jwt;charset=UTF-8
```

```
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Cache-Control: no-store
Pragma: no-cache

[
    {
        "key_id": "6a76daff-113f-4c84-83e2-5362b801bf91",
        "use": "SIGNATURE",
        "n": ,
        "e": 65537
    }
]
```
